heading: Police cautious on declaring Umzumbe murders as work of serial killer
article: The DA in KZN wants the rapes and murders of several women in the Umzumbe area to be investigated as the work of a serial killer, and while police have said they are looking at this possibility, they are not yet ready to make a declaration on a serial murderer.

heading: Lockdown sees a spike in fake news being shared in SA
article: The proliferation of "fake news" and misinformation on Covid-19 and the subsequent lockdown are skewing the narrative on the disease.

heading: Mayor Dan Plato writes to President Ramaphosa on Cape Town land invasions
article: Land invaders have descended on open land in Leiden and Rosendal in Delft as the City battles to block their attempts erect shacks.
